commits: 689cfd2: fix(#246): add visibilitychange recovery for mobile background resume

test_cases.name: triggers data re-fetch when visibilitychange fires with visible state
test_cases.description: Verifies that handleRetry flow (fetchWorktree etc.) is executed when visibilitychange fires with visible state

test_cases.name: resets error state when visibilitychange fires during error
test_cases.description: Verifies that error display is cleared and data is re-fetched when visibilitychange fires while in error state

test_cases.name: does not trigger data re-fetch when visibilityState is hidden
test_cases.description: Verifies that no fetch calls are made when visibilityState is hidden

test_cases.name: throttles rapid visibilitychange events within 5 seconds
test_cases.description: Verifies that RECOVERY_THROTTLE_MS (5000ms) guard prevents duplicate API calls within the throttle window

message: TDD implementation complete. All 4 new visibility change recovery tests pass. New code coverage 100%. Full file coverage 57.42% (2000+ line file). 0 ESLint errors, 0 TypeScript errors. All 3091 existing unit tests continue to pass.
